item.title: Impact of LLMs on Knowledge Validation — Daily KBC Note (2026-01-24)
item.description:
Impact of LLMs on Knowledge Validation

In today’s information age, the validation of knowledge is more crucial than ever. With the rise of fake news, misinformation, and deep fakes, it has become increasingly difficult to discern what is true and what is not. This is where the concept of Large Language Models (LLMs) comes into play and its impact on knowledge validation cannot be understated. In the context of Knowledge-Based Currency (KBC), understanding how LLMs can be utilized to verify and authenticate knowledge is key to building a trustworthy and transparent knowledge economy.

item.title: Impact Investing in KBC — Daily KBC Note (2026-01-23)
item.description:
Impact Investing in KBC: Shaping a Fairer, Knowledge-Driven World

In today’s rapidly changing world, impact investing has emerged as a powerful tool for driving positive change while also generating financial returns. Impact investing involves investing in companies, organizations, and funds with the intention of generating a measurable, beneficial social or environmental impact alongside a financial return. This concept is particularly relevant to the Knowledge-Based Currency (KBC) movement, as it aligns with the core principles of using knowledge as a valuable asset to create positive outcomes for society.

item.title: Impact Investing in KBC — Daily KBC Note (2025-11-29)
item.description:
Impact Investing in KBC: Shaping a Knowledge‑Based Economy

Welcome, fellow knowledge enthusiasts! Today, we’re diving into the exciting world of Impact Investing in Knowledge‑Based Currency (KBC). But what exactly is impact investing, and why does it matter in the context of KBC?

Overview

Impact investing is a strategy that aims to generate positive social or environmental impact alongside financial returns. In the case of KBC, impact investing involves allocating resources to projects or initiatives that not only yield financial gains but also contribute to the growth and development of the knowledge economy.
